bug.author: ChatSam
bug.summary: IntTensor methods sin(), cos() are broken
bug.description:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/ChatSam>@ChatSam</denchmark-link> commented on <denchmark-link:https://github.com/OpenMined/OpenMined/issues/409>Wed Jan 31 2018</denchmark-link>
The IntTensor methods which return objects of type FloatTensor which are sin() and cos() are broken. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6478266/35606314-656cb044-061c-11e8-918a-3d7ea7345cb2.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Claiming this issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/OpenMined/PySyft/issues/1314>#1314</denchmark-link> . Found a fix

PR for the bugfix - <denchmark-link:https://github.com/OpenMined/PySyft/pull/1315>#1315</denchmark-link>
Added integration tests for the fix -PR - <denchmark-link:https://github.com/OpenMined/OpenMined/pull/410>https://github.com/OpenMined/OpenMined/pull/410</denchmark-link>
